editApplication.title: Are you sure you want to edit Application: PCGL-{{id}}
editApplication.description: If so, the application will move back into Draft status and you will need to resubmit the application for review.

notifications.successMessage: Application PCGL-{{id}} has been withdrawn from review and is now available to edit.
notifications.failureTitle: Failed to Withdraw Application from Review
notifications.failureMessage: Something went wrong. Application could not be be withdrawn from review and is not available to edit. Please try again later.

closeApplication.title: Are you sure you want to close Application: PCGL-{{id}}

notifications.closeApplicationSuccess: Your application, PCGL-{{id}}, has been closed.
notifications.closeApplicationFailed: Sorry, there was an unexpected error while closing your application. Please try again later.

rejectApplication.title: Are you sure you want to reject Application: PCGL-{{id}}

notifications.rejectApplicationSuccess: Your application, PCGL-{{id}}, has been rejected.
notifications.rejectApplicationFailed: Sorry, there was an unexpected error while rejecting your application. Please try again later.

authorization.description: For authorization, we require a valid institutional email address. This will be the email address you will use to log in to PCGL DACO and will be the email address associated with PCGL Controlled Data Access.

revisions.title: Request Revisions
revisions.description: Please provide the revisions details for the sections that have issues. These details will be emailed to the applicant.

success.text: Request for revisions has been sent to Application PCGL-{{id}}
